title: Why Wintermute and Other Market Makers Stopped Trading During Bitcoin Crash, $19B Liquidation
contentSnippet: Market makers paused trading during last week's flash crash, potentially adding to the volatility. Here’s what happened.

title: Your Company's Balance Sheet is Doomed Without Bitcoin
contentSnippet: The traditional corporate playbook risks not only underperformance, but a breach of fiduciary duty as cash reserves bleed away on the altar of money-printing, argues Musqet founder David Parkinson.

title: Babylon claims breakthrough in using native Bitcoin collateral in DeFi: Finance Redefined
contentSnippet: Babylon unveils a proof-of-concept for using native Bitcoin in DeFi lending, as BNB Chain and Hyperliquid post major updates.

title: Chainlink's LINK Plunges 9% as Intense Selling Overpowers Caliber's $2M Accumulation
contentSnippet: Nasdaq-listed Caliber purchased $2 million LINK while the Chainlink Reserve added nearly 60,000 tokens, but bears remain in control.

title: Here's When to Expect the SEA Token as OpenSea Trading Volume Spikes
contentSnippet: NFT marketplace and token trading platform OpenSea will launch its SEA token in Q1 2026, with 50% allocated for its community of users.

title: Price predictions 10/17: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, SOL, DOGE, ADA, HYPE, LINK, XLM
contentSnippet: The odds for the resumption of ‘Uptober’ dwindle as Bitcoin, Ether and most altcoins continue to drop toward new lows. Will next week’s US economic calendar events help restore the uptrend?

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland's nationwide gambling authority said that user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: 9 Biggest Bitcoin Crashes in History
contentSnippet: Mt. Gox hacks, China bans, COVID panic, and the FTX implosion: Here’s a brief history of the biggest price crashes in Bitcoin history.

title: Huobi Founder Li Lin to Lead $1B Ether Treasury Firm: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: Li Lin’s Avenir Capital is said to be teaming up with Asia's crypto pioneers to build a regulated vehicle focused on ether accumulation.

contentSnippet: Investors are increasingly tapping gold-backed crypto tokens for active trading and hedging, a CEX.io report said.

contentSnippet: Bitcoin fell early Friday as tariff tensions and banking concerns weigh on markets. Analysts are monitoring the key $103,000 support level.

title: Stellar Lumen's XLM Token Down 6% Amid Heavy Sell Pressure
contentSnippet: Stellar Lumens (XLM) slid 6.25% amid heavy institutional liquidation, even as the network’s latest protocol upgrade strengthened its enterprise-grade transaction capabilities.

title: FIFA Hit With Swiss Criminal Complaint Over NFT World Cup Ticket Vouchers
contentSnippet: FIFA's Avalanche-based NFT collectibles platform is now the subject of a formal criminal complaint filed by Switzerland's gambling authority.

title: Hedera's HBAR Slides 11% as Selling Pressure Deepens
contentSnippet: Hedera’s native token faced sustained downward momentum over the past 24 hours, testing key support near $0.16 amid heightened trading activity and persistent bearish sentiment.

title: Arthur Hayes’ Maelstrom Seeks $250M Private Equity Fund to Acquire Crypto Firms: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: Arthur Hayes’ Maelstrom family office is launching a private equity fund targeting infrastructure and analytics firms in crypto, aiming for $250 million in capital.

title: Coinbase, Binance Among Exchanges Targeted for Widened AML Checks by French Regulator: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: Failure to meet the requirements set by ACPR could compromise an exchange's ability to get a MiCA license from France.

title: From South Park to Wall Street: Are prediction markets going mainstream?
contentSnippet: Prediction markets are rapidly going mainstream, and one expert argues that their simplicity could make them the first DeFi tool to achieve mass adoption.

title: Recent Fedspeak Confirms Intentions for Rate Cuts to Contiue: BofA
contentSnippet: There appeared to be consensus around growing labor market risks even as sticky inflation remains an issue.

title: Morning Minute: Bitcoin Falls Again as JPMorgan Blames Crypto Natives for Selloff
contentSnippet: And sell off they have, as Bitcoin hit a new four-month low overnight—turning crypto markets deep red.

title: Bitcoin 'bull run is over,' traders say, with 50% BTC price crash warning
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s drop below key support levels today could be a sign that the 2025 bull run is over, as a trader sets $52,000 as the bear market target.

title: Here’s why Russia ranks highest in Europe for crypto adoption: Chainalysis
contentSnippet: Russia’s rapid DeFi expansion and increase in large-value transfers indicate growing adoption of crypto for financial services, according to Chainalysis.

title: Japan's Top Banks Plan Joint Stablecoin Launch: Nikkei
contentSnippet: Mitsubishi UFJ, Sumitomo Mitsui and Mizuho Financial Groups aim to create a shared framework for stablecoin issuance and transfer, according to a story in Nikkei.

title: The ghost of Mt. Gox will stop haunting Bitcoin this Halloween
contentSnippet: From Tokyo Whale to the Halloween deadline, Mt. Gox’s long journey through Bitcoin history is nearing its end.

title: Decentralized compute networks will democratize global AI access
contentSnippet: AI compute remains centralized in developed nations. Decentralized blockchain networks can unlock idle GPUs to democratize access.

title: Is Smart Money Exiting? Whales Dump Solana, Aave, and Aster
contentSnippet: A broad altcoin sell-off is seeing whales de-risking, according to analysts, citing fears of a black swan event.

title: Japanese mega banks to jointly issue yen-pegged stablecoin: Report
contentSnippet: Japan’s top banks plan to launch a joint yen-based stablecoin using MUFG’s Progmat platform to modernize payments and corporate settlements.

title: ARK 21Shares Bitcoin ETF Records Highest Outflows Since August
contentSnippet: Analysts cited fallout from tariffs and last week's $19B liquidation event as driving institutional investors to defensive positioning.

title: Bitcoin's Plunge Below $105,000 Sends Crypto Market Cap to Lowest Level Since July
contentSnippet: Analysts argue that crypto's "bullish structure" remains intact, despite a sell-off driven by fears in the traditional banking sector.

title: 3メガバンク、円建てステーブルコインを共同発行へ　導入第一弾は三菱商事＝報道
contentSnippet: 三菱UFJ、三井住友、みずほの3メガバンクが円建てステーブルコインを共同発行。信託型により高い安全性を実現し、クロスボーダー送金のコスト削減を目指す。プログマのシステムを活用し今年度内に実用化予定。

title: Salesforce Faces Class Action Over Alleged Illegal AI Training Data
contentSnippet: The authors claim the company trained its XGen models on nearly 200,000 pirated books, then scrubbed public disclosures.

title: ファンプラのIEO参加方法と注目ポイント｜コインチェックの実績、申込前に知るべき情報まとめ
contentSnippet: 音楽ファンクラブ運営大手Fanplusと協業するFanplaは14日、暗号資産「Fanpla（FPL）」のIEO（InitialExchangeOffering）をコインチェックで実施すると発表した。購入申し込みは10月21日に開始され、1...

title: メタプラネット、ビットコイン複利モデルで反転狙う　サイモンCEOが方針説明
contentSnippet: メタプラネット株が400円台まで下落しmNAVは0.89に。サイモンCEOは「優先株で希薄化せずBTCを買い増す」方針を再確認。複利モデルの理論と背景を解説。

title: コインベース、ステーブルコイン決済プラットフォームを開始　USDC保有で年利4.1%
contentSnippet: コインベースが企業向けステーブルコイン決済プラットフォーム「Coinbase Business」を発表。USDC保有で年利4.1%、低手数料・即時決済でB2B決済の課題を解決。会計ソフト連携も対応。

title: ユニスワップがソラナ対応開始、非EVMチェーン初の統合実現
contentSnippet: ユニスワップが非EVMネットワークとして初めてソラナに対応し、ウェブアプリでSOLトークンの直接スワップが可能になった。100万以上のトークンにアクセスでき、今後はブリッジングやクロスチェーン機能も予定している。

title: ビットコイン価格モメンタム弱まるも、クジラの買いは堅調＝CryptoQuant
contentSnippet: CryptoQuantが仮想通貨ビットコイン市場の近況を分析。短期的な上昇の勢いが弱化しているがデータは大口投資家の買い増しを示唆していると指摘。上昇再開の水準などを分析した。

title: ビットコイン11万ドルを割り込み続落、米中首脳会談控え市場の緊張高まる
contentSnippet: ビットコインは前日比2.39%安の108,800ドルに下落。トランプ大統領が中国との貿易戦争継続を認め、月内の米中首脳会談を控える中で市場に緊張感が広がっている。VIX指数は5カ月ぶり高水準に急騰し、地銀の融資問題も重なり市場心理が悪化。一方で金価格高騰を背景にトークン化された金の時価総額が34億ドルに達するなど、リスク回避の動きが鮮明となっている。

title: 米上場Zeta、ビットコイン決済で約350億円私募調達　SolvBTCトークン採用
contentSnippet: 米上場ZetaがBTC決済で2.3億ドル私募。SolvBTC採用により、ビットコインを受動的保有から利回り創出型の生産的資産へ転換する財務戦略となる。

title: リップル、XRPトレジャリー設立で1500億円資金調達を主導
contentSnippet: リップルがXRPトレジャリーのため10億ドル規模の資金調達を主導していることが明らかになった。SPAC経由で資金を調達し、XRPに特化した最大級のデジタル資産保有企業を設立する計画だ。

title: 仮想通貨IEO投資の稼ぎ方　成功事例一覧と今後の予定、参加方法とは｜2025年版
contentSnippet: 暗号資産（仮想通貨）投資で公募価格の数倍もの高値付けることもある国内外のIEO事例ですが、初値で公募割れしたケースもあるなどリスクも付き物です。今後の注目IEOにはナナメウエ社の「YAY」、NOT A HOTELの「NAC」をbitFlyerやGMOコインが販売検討しており、口座開設がおすすめです。国内外のIEO成功事例、参加方法まで解説。
